short: Studying the dominant colors, textures, and brightness of images is a great initial step for both understanding a particular collection as well as learning how to work with digital images. The model here computes several different metrics for a collection of images. The include the average brightness, the average saturation (how rich the colors are), and the proportion of the image that is covered by difference colors.
long: Studying the dominant colors, textures, and brightness of images is a great initial step for both understanding a particular collection as well as learning how to work with digital images. The model here computes several different metrics for a collection of images. The include the average brightness, the average saturation (how rich the colors are), and the proportion of the image that is covered by difference colors.
